extendedInfo.description: Official app for WAFL. Check fixtures, results, news, match previews, the latest from twitter and enter your WAFL footy tips from via footytips.com.au.

reviews.title: Good app if you live interstate
reviews.comment: Good app if you live interstate, could have live scores improved!
reviews.author: Christopher J. Hogg

reviews.title: Needs live scores
reviews.comment: Just go to the wafl website for live scores
reviews.author: Rory McDONALD

reviews.title: Getting there
reviews.comment: Works on my HTC.  Shows ladder and stats, but still no colts or reserves.  Live score would be nice too. Go the black ducks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t bother
reviews.comment: Scores and nothing else. No ladder, no quarter by quarter breakdown and the reserves and colts button does not work
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: WAFL
reviews.comment: Reserves and colts results wont display , keeps coming up with an error
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs improvement
reviews.comment: No detailed scores..ie G+B. When clicking on live score it redirects to the WAFL site.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No stats
reviews.comment: Scores but no stats... Please fix this and it will be a great app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No update for 2013?
reviews.comment: I\'m guessing there\'s an issue with the 2013 fixtures not being linked from this app. I don\'t think there\'s been any update, worked ok with limited functions last season but now it just crashes. If there\'s no update for 2013 I wouldn\'t bother installing this now.
reviews.author: Steve Hardingham
